attributes.action: To abolish or significantly reduce the taxation on pensioners savings income.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are being squeezed beyond all reasonable limits by ever reducing savings rates coupled with taxation, just when we need this bit of income the most, since the government decided borrowing rates had to be savagely cut to stimulate the economy,under these special circumstances, it would be less savage if taxes could be revised to allow for citizens effected by these events

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
